values: 光滑的；细腻的；均匀的；流畅的；醇和的；柔和的；不苦的；无风浪的；平静的；平稳的；顺利的；沉着的；镇定的；混合均匀的；悦耳的
使光滑；磨光；抚平；擦亮；消除（问题或困难）；缓解（紧张局势）；简化（程序或过程）；为…铺平道路；（将软物质）均匀涂抹于
平稳地；流畅地；轻松地；毫无困难地；顺畅地；优雅地；柔顺地；顺利地；平整地；自信地；连续而流畅地
平滑表面；光滑物；平坦地带；抚平

synonym.mean: 使光滑；消除；使优雅；缓和

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 平稳地，平滑地；流畅地，流利地
[公路] 路面平整机；弄平的人；[机] 修光工具；滤波器
举止优雅的人；善于讨好女人的男子；一种果汁与牛奶的混合饮料
举止优雅的人；善于讨好女人的男子

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指表面十分平滑，无任何粗糙的感觉。引申作圆滑解。
强调没有高低之处，且在同一水平面，可引申指才能相等或与相邻某物平行。
指光滑平整的表面，但不一定是水平的。
通常指平面上的各点或一条直线的各点处在同一平面或直线上。

word_group.brief_definition: 顺其自然；好事坏事都接受, 既能享乐也能吃苦
word_group.phrase: take the rough with the smooth

word_group.brief_definition: 使某人恢复平静；使某人息怒
平稳过渡；顺利过渡；顺利转型
平滑流；平稳流动；连续流
抚平；消除（困难等）；把…弄平

bilingual.source: We find out if they are smooth or rough.
bilingual.target: 我们发现它们是光滑的还是粗糙的。

bilingual.source: We were walking on flat and smooth sand.
bilingual.target: 我们走在平坦光滑的沙地上。

bilingual.source: She still has smooth skin and straight black hair.
bilingual.target: 她依然有光滑的皮肤和直黑的头发。

bilingual.source: He slumped down onto the hard, white sea and rubbed the smooth, glassy surface.
bilingual.target: 他瘫倒在坚硬的白色海面上，摩擦着光滑的表面。

bilingual.source: The path was paved with smooth stones.
bilingual.target: 小路铺满了光滑的石头。

bilingual.source: The beach was covered with smooth rocks.
bilingual.target: 海滩上布满了光滑的岩石。

bilingual.source: Apply lipstick evenly for a smooth finish.
bilingual.target: 均匀地涂抹口红以获得光滑的效果。

bilingual.source: Geckos can climb smooth surfaces with ease.
bilingual.target: 壁虎可以轻松地爬上光滑的表面。

bilingual.source: Mince the vegetables to make a smooth puree.
bilingual.target: 把蔬菜切碎，做成光滑的泥。

bilingual.source: The once smooth surface coarsened over time.
bilingual.target: 曾经光滑的表面随着时间的推移变粗糙的。

list.abstract: 图像平滑用MRI制作大脑功能活动时的标化方法。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's just be patient and see if we can smooth things over from back channels.
yingyinNormal.zh: 耐心点，我尽量暗中调整一下。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm happy with that. It's quite smooth, got a bit of elasticity in it now. Half it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很喜欢这种感觉，现在很光滑，也有弹性了，分成两部分。

yingyinNormal.en: To the naked eye, a petal looks smooth. But magnify it 1,000 times and you can see its real structure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肉眼看上去，花瓣似乎很光滑，可是放大1000倍之后，花瓣真正的结构便一览无余了。

yingyinNormal.en: We wrap it round and round like this. It's a bit bumpy. No, I smooth the jolt with my hands and I add a handle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来我们把黏土像这样叠起来。可是这样就不平整了吗。接下来我用手把表面抹平然后再加上个一个手把。

yingyinNormal.en: And all you're doing is playing with it until you get to the point where your dough is nice and soft and smooth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样做直到掌握要领为止，那就是你的面团很漂亮，很松软，很光滑。

yingyinNormal.en: I know the road hasn't exactly been smooth, and some of you would have gladly kicked me out of the car along the way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道这一路上有很多颠簸，你们当中有些人还想把我从车上踢出去。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Loski was clean and smooth on the outside but it seemed like there was something rotten buried just beneath the surface.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯基先生表面上看起来很干净整洁，但他内心似乎装着什么腐烂掉的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: The Hudson was the only place that was long enough and smooth enough and wide enough to even attempt to land the airplane safely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有哈德逊河足够长，足够平和足够宽，来冒险尝试把飞机安全降落。

yingyinNormal.en: Leaning in does not mean your path will be straight or smooth, and most people who make great contribution start way later than Mark Zuckerberg.
yingyinNormal.zh: "向前一步"并不意味着你的前路将一帆风顺，很多人对世界的重大贡献都远远晚于马克·扎克伯格。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you might be right. But back to you. I know you think you're some sort of smooth-talking ladies' man, but the truth is, you are just pathetic and creepy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，也许你说的对，但是回到你身上，我知道你认为自己是个能言善辩的少女杀手，但事实是，你很可悲又恶心。

yingyinNormal.en: Many visual beauty standards vary between cultures and eras, and signs of youth, fertility and good health, such as long lustrous hair, or smooth, scar-free skin, are almost always in demand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 视觉审美标准在各文化、时代之间皆相异，年轻、生育力与健康的征象也都不同，例如有光泽的长长秀发或光滑无痕的肌肤几乎总是需求不断。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: deal successfully with a problem, difficulty, or perceived fault

examination_example.sentence: In previous eras of drastic technological change, entrepreneurs <highlight>smoothed</highlight> the transition by dreaming up ways to combine labor and machines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在以前技术大变革时代，企业家们通过想出将劳动力和机器结合起来的方法来平滑过渡。

sense_info_list.en: give something a flat, regular surface or appearance by running one's hand over it
free a course of action from difficulties or problems
(of food or drink) without harshness or bitterness
(of a person or their manner, actions, or words) suavely charming in a way considered to be unctuous

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 平滑地；平稳地；顺利地；流畅地

word_family.mean: adj. 光滑的；平滑的；醇和的；不苦的；均匀的；细腻的；无风浪的；平静的；平稳的

sense_info_list.en: give something a flat, regular surface or appearance by running one's hand over it
deal successfully with a problem, difficulty, or perceived fault

examination_example.sentence: Central control and collective organisation can produce <highlight>smoother</highlight> and fairer outcomes, though even that much is never guaranteed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中央控制和集体组织能够产生更平稳、更公平的结果，尽管即便如此也无法保证。

examination_example.sentence: Life past 40 is far from <highlight>smooth</highlight> sailing, but it's so much more than the reductive depictions we see in women's magazines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 40岁以后的生活远非一帆风顺，但它远比我们在女性杂志上看到的简化描写要丰富很多。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 平滑地；平稳地；顺利地；流畅地

word_family.mean: adj. 光滑的；平滑的；醇和的；不苦的；均匀的；细腻的；无风浪的；平静的；平稳的

sense_info_list.en: give something a flat, regular surface or appearance by running one's hand over it

examination_example.sentence: Comfortable bikes and a <highlight>smooth</highlight> tour route (路线) make cycling between the sites fun and relaxing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 舒适的自行车和一个顺畅的旅游路线使站点之间的旅途变得有趣而又让人放松。

examination_example.sentence: Comfortable bikes and a <highlight>smooth</highlight> tour route (路线) make cycling between the sites fun and relaxing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 舒适的自行车和一个顺畅的旅游路线使站点之间的旅途变得有趣而又让人放松。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 平滑地；平稳地；顺利地；流畅地

word_family.mean: adj. 光滑的；平滑的；醇和的；不苦的；均匀的；细腻的；无风浪的；平静的；平稳的

sense_info_list.en: give something a flat, regular surface or appearance by running one's hand over it

examination_example.sentence: Put the pack on a <highlight>smooth</highlight> surface, above the waist height.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将背包放在比腰部高的光滑表面上。

examination_example.sentence: We tried our best, but the results aren't exactly <highlight>smooth</highlight> music like what we have expected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们尽了最大的努力，但结果并不是我们所期待的那种流畅的音乐。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Smooth</highlight> music helps me relax after a long working week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 流畅的音乐帮助我在漫长的一周工作后放松。

examination_example.sentence: This train felt so <highlight>smooth</highlight> that if you were not looking out of windows, you could hardly tell we were moving.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这列火车感觉非常平稳，以至于如果你不往窗外看，你几乎看不出我们在动。
